message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you my unique product. It's worth $120 to you, but I'm willing to let it go for $110. This is a great opportunity to get a deal on something you value highly. Let me know if this works for you!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you being willing to negotiate. However, $110 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $105 for it. Let me know if that works for you.
I understand your budget, Bob. I'm glad we're able to discuss this. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product for $107.50. I hope this works for you, and I look forward to your response!
